AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Staff Nurse Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 18, 2025, 10:34 IST
 All India Institute of Medical Science Delhi
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 18-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 25,000 to 25,000




FOLLOW

All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) Delhi has declared the latest job notification for 2025. Allotted Vacancies for Staff Nurse Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc Nursing, B.Sc Nursing. can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Delhi.

AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Staff Nurse	01	B.Sc Nursing, M.Sc Nursing

Age Limit for the AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 28 years.

Selection Process for the AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 25,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the AIIMS Delhi Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Staff Nurse Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Then, send your resume along with the documents required to the email address given below.

Email Address

drdeepak@aiims.edu 

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	18-08-2025
Last Date of Application	28-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
